basic.name: Fel Flame (Q)
basic.description: Release a wave of flame, dealing 210 damage to enemies.

basic.name: Drain Life (W)
basic.description: Drain the life from an enemy over 3 seconds, dealing 132 damage per second and healing Gul'dan for 188 Health per second.

basic.name: Corruption (E)
basic.description: Call forth three bursts of shadow energy, dealing 204 damage over 6 seconds. Corruption can stack up to 3 times on an enemy.

heroic.name: Horrify (R)
heroic.description: After 0.75 seconds, deal 120 damage to enemy Heroes in an area and Fear them for 2 seconds. While Feared, Heroes are Silenced and are forced to run away from Horrify's center.

heroic.name: Rain of Destruction (R)
heroic.description: After 1.5 seconds, summon a rain of meteors in an area for 7 seconds. Each meteor deals 165 damage in a small area.

trait.name: Life Tap (T)
trait.description: Gul'dan does not regenerate Mana.Activate to restore 25% of Gul'dan's Mana.

1.name: Pursuit of Flame
1.description: Quest: Hit 30 enemy Heroes with Fel Flame.Reward: Fel Flame's radius is increased by 10%.

1.name: Chaotic Energy
1.description: Increases the cast range of Drain Life by 25% and the healing provided by Regen Globes by 50%.Quest: Gather 15 Regen Globes.Reward: Basic Ability Mana costs are permanently reduced by 20.

1.name: Echoed Corruption
1.description: Quest: Hit 40 enemy Heroes with Corruption.Reward: After the third strike, Corruption strikes 3 times in the opposite direction.

4.name: Health Funnel
4.description: Drain Life's cooldown recharges 100% faster while it is channeling. If an enemy dies while under the effect of Drain Life, the cooldown is instantly refreshed.

4.name: Improved Life Tap
4.description: Increase the Mana restored by Life Tap to 40%.

4.name: Consume Soul
4.description: Instantly kill an enemy Minion and heal for 365 Health.Stores up to 3 charges.

7.name: Bound by Shadow
7.description: Each enemy Hero hit with Fel Flame reduces the cooldown of Corruption by 1.75 seconds.

7.name: Curse of Exhaustion
7.description: Drain Life deals 50% more damage and Slows the target's Movement Speed by 40%.

7.name: Hunger for Power
7.description: Increases Spell Power by 15% but reduces healing received from allies by 25%.

10.name: Horrify
10.description: After 0.75 seconds, deal 120 damage to enemy Heroes in an area and Fear them for 2 seconds. While Feared, Heroes are Silenced and are forced to run away from Horrify's center.

10.name: Rain of Destruction
10.description: After 1.5 seconds, summon a rain of meteors in an area for 7 seconds. Each meteor deals 165 damage in a small area.

13.name: Fel Armor
13.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Fel Flame grants 50 Spell Armor for 2.5 seconds, reducing Ability Damage taken by 50%.

13.name: Harvest Life
13.description: Drain Life heals for 75% more Health when used on Heroes.

13.name: Dark Bargain
13.description: Gul'dan's maximum Health is permanently increased by 40% but his respawn time is increased by 10 seconds.

13.name: Healthstone
13.description: Activate to heal for 25% of Gul'dan's maximum Health.

16.name: Rampant Hellfire
16.description: Fel Flame's damage is increased by 12% for 5 seconds when hitting an enemy Hero. This can stack up to 5 times.

16.name: Ruinous Affliction
16.description: Corruption deals an additional 78 damage on impact. If the enemy is hit by all three strikes, the third strike deals 268 damage.

16.name: Darkness Within
16.description: Dealing 600 damage to enemy Heroes causes the next cast of Life Tap to cost no Health and grant Gul'dan 25% Spell Power for 5 seconds.

20.name: Haunt
20.description: Increases the duration of Horrify by 1 second, and while Feared, enemies lose 20 Armor, causing them to take 20% increased damage.

20.name: Deep Impact
20.description: Rain of Destruction slows enemies Movement Speed by 90% for 0.5 seconds.

20.name: Demonic Circle
20.description: Summon a Demonic Circle at Gul'dan's location. Activate to teleport Gul'dan to the Demonic Circle.
